title: Possibility of new variants to still develop: Health Ministry
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Health says that there is still a possibility of new coronavirus variant developing once again.
Dr. Ranjith Batuwantudawa, Director of the Health Promotion Bureau, stated that the disease has not been eradicated fully from the country.
He also stated that only 53% of the target group had received the booster vaccine.
